channel.title: Home on Aren Lighting
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Aren Lighting

item.title: Chauvet Swarm 5 FX
item.description:
Specifications

  • Model: Chauvet Swarm 5 FX
  • Quantity: 1 unit

Point lasers (red and green), white fill strobes and color strobes (red, green, blue, amber, white)

item.title: DMX Controller
item.description:
Specifications

  • Primary Controller: ASUS TUF A16
  • Software: QLC+

This is the laptop I typically use as a DMX controller with a USB-to-DMX adapter. I have a few backups as well.

item.title: Fog Machine
item.description:
Specifications

  • LED Light: Static or flashing, RGB and variants. Non-programmable.
  • Quantity: 1 unit

The water-based fog might be difficult for people with asthma or extreme sensitivity to the odor, but it allows DMX lasers to show through the fog (rather than just on the surface they’re hitting).

item.title: LED Light Strip
item.description:
Specifications

  • Colors: Anything between rgb (0,0,0) and (255,255,100-255) (near the end the blue light is limited to around 100)
  • Functions: Currently flashing, running blobs of light, multi-colors, etc.
  • Quantity: 300 LEDs, 1 strip

300 LEDs in the light strip, controlled by an ESP32. I can program most of anything into the LED strip, but the programming takes time and effort, as does setting up the strip with tape or adhesive.

item.title: Venue Mothership VP
item.description:
Specifications

  • Model: Venue Mothership VP
  • Quantity: 1 unit

Spinning head with 8 bright LED lights, 6 point LED lights and a green laser on top.

Replace this with your actual equipment photo

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a new lighting designer with a powerful set of programming skills. I don’t have many lights, but I can set up custom-programmed lights like my LED strip with the ESP 32 running micropython and a mosquitto server to sync its lights playing with a live performance and DMX lights.

What I Do

  • Basic lighting for DIY venues and basement shows
  • Custom lighting sets for local bands

I need experience so pricing is either free or very cheap for now.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Interested in working together? Get in touch!

Email: arenslighting@gmail.com

Location: Madison, WI

Services

  • Basic lighting for DIY venues and basement shows
  • Custom lighting sets for local bands

I need experience so pricing is either free or very cheap for now.

If you have any questions or requests, reach out on email or Instagram.
